Home.iconText: Hi. What insights are you looking for?

adminToolkits.content: Create, view and manage the connectors   Create Connector

adminToolkits.title: Search Configuration
adminToolkits.content: Manage the search index and customise what and how the filters will be displayed in your Search UI

adminToolkits.title: Document Settings Manager
adminToolkits.content: View and manage the metadata and tags of your documents

adminToolkits.title: Automatic Entity Recognition
adminToolkits.content: A simple demo of how the unstructured text is classified based on your knowledge graphs

adminToolkits.title: Search UI Catalog
adminToolkits.content: A library of Search UI widgets which can be used in different search scenarios
